title: User Signup with Valid Employee ID
description: Verify that a new user can successfully signup by providing valid details including a verified employee ID.

steps.description: Navigate to the signup page from the landing page.
Enter valid user details including a unique employee ID.
Submit the signup form.
Check that signup is successful and user is redirected to the authenticated home or assessment page.

title: User Signup with Invalid Employee ID
description: Verify that signup fails when an invalid or unrecognized employee ID is used.

steps.description: Navigate to the signup page.
Enter user details with an invalid or incorrectly formatted employee ID.
Submit the signup form.
Confirm that an error message is displayed indicating invalid employee ID and signup is rejected.

title: User Login with Correct Credentials
description: Verify that registered users can login successfully using their employee ID and password.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input valid employee ID and password.
Click the login button.
Check that the user is authenticated and redirected to the assessment dashboard.

title: User Login with Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify login fails with incorrect or invalid employee ID or password.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input invalid employee ID or password.
Click the login button.
Confirm that an error message appears indicating failed login attempt and no access is granted.

title: Complete Timed Assessment Successfully
description: Verify that authenticated users can take and complete a timed assessment, with correct timing enforcement and result calculation.

steps.description: Login as an authenticated user and navigate to the assessment engine.
Start a timed test with multiple question cards.
Answer all questions within the allocated time.
Verify that the timer counts down accurately without skipping or freezing.
Submit the test upon completion.
Verify that calculated results are displayed immediately with correct scoring and feedback.

title: Timed Assessment Enforces Time Limit
description: Verify the assessment engine automatically ends the test when the time expires and calculates results accordingly.

steps.description: Login and start the timed assessment.
Delay answering to exceed the allocated time limit.
Confirm the test automatically ends once the time expires.
Verify that partial answers are scored correctly and results are shown.

title: Admin Dashboard Displays Up-to-Date Analytics
description: Verify that admin users can log in and see real-time updated charts for user performance, compliance, and topic suggestions without errors.

steps.description: Login as an administrator and navigate to the Admin Dashboard.
Verify performance analytics charts load correctly and reflect latest data.
Confirm compliance charts and topic focus suggestions are visible and error-free.
Perform assessment activity as users and observe Dashboard updates.
Verify that the dashboard data updates in real-time or near real-time with new user data.

title: Real-Time WebSocket Analytics Update Correctly
description: Verify that the real-time analytics system updates visitor counts, page views, and timestamps via WebSocket without data loss or delay.

steps.description: Open multiple sessions (browser tabs or different devices) accessing various pages of the platform.
Verify the visitor count and page views increment and decrement correctly as users connect and disconnect.
Check timestamps of activity update continuously and reflect live interaction.

title: Landing Page Responsiveness Across Devices
description: Verify that the landing page layout, hero carousel, and navigation are fully responsive and functional on desktop, tablet, and mobile screen sizes.

steps.description: Open the landing page on multiple devices or use browser developer tools to simulate various screen sizes.
Confirm the landing page content adapts correctly without horizontal scroll or layout breakage.
Verify the hero carousel functions smoothly with navigation controls visible and operable.
Check that navigation links to signup and login are always accessible and usable.

title: Profile Management Data Persistence
description: Verify that users can update their profile details including employee ID and that changes persist after logout and login.

steps.description: Login as user and navigate to profile management.
Modify profile fields such as employee ID and other personal information.
Save the updated profile.
Confirm a success message is shown and profile data is updated on the UI.
Logout and login again.
Verify that the updated profile information is correctly persisted and displayed.

title: Handle Network Interruptions During Assessment
description: Verify how the system behaves if the network connection is lost during a timed assessment, including attempt to resume or save progress.

steps.description: Start a timed assessment and answer a few questions.
Simulate network disconnection.
Verify the system warns user about connection loss and attempts to save progress if possible.
Restore network connection.
Confirm the assessment either resumes correctly or data is saved and test can be resumed appropriately.
